channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver (EP Web Page Composer)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver (EP Web Page Composer)

item.title: CVE-2022-28217|2024-08-03T05:48:37.297Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20%28ep%20web%20page%20composer%29
item.description: Some part of SAP NetWeaver (EP Web Page Composer) does not sufficiently validate an XML document accepted from an untrusted source, which allows an adversary to exploit unprotected XML parking at endpoints, and a possibility to conduct SSRF attacks that could compromise systemï¿½s Availability by causing system to crash.
